preqs: For students in B2003, B20033, B2012, B2013, B2018 must have passed MKF1120 and MKF2111 and MKF2801 and one more (any) Marketing unit.For students in any other courses (pre 2016)  must have passed MKF1120, MKF2111 and any two other Marketing units.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MKF3121%, MKT312, MKT3121, MKW3121, MKW3121H, MKW3121S}
(Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MKF1120, MKF2111, MKP1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} AND  Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points from units owned by {50000794})
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {B2003, B20033, B2012, B2013, B2018} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MKF1120, MKF2111} with grades other than {RES-SKILLS-DEF, STANDARD-NS} and  Must have passed 12 (I/W) credit points from units owned by {50000794}) Otherwise (true OR  For COURSE_CODE IN {B2003, B20033, B2012, B2013, B2018} Do (Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {MKF1120, MKF2111, MKF2801} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} and  Must have passed 6 (I/W) credit points from units owned by {50000794}) Otherwise true)
Unit was previously coded {MKF3121%, MKT312, MKT3121, MKW3121, MKW3121H, MKW3121S}

description: The development of corporate marketing strategies; marketing planning procedure; evaluation and control in marketing planning; Australian case studies in corporate marketing planning and strategy. Concepts of product management; designing a product strategy; monitoring planning/marketing.
